question: Which country's most precious religious and historical heirloom is "Lalibela Cross"?
explanation: Lalibela Cross is Ethiopia's most precious religious and historical heirloom which is a large, elaborately decorated processional cross. Biete Medhani Alem (House of the Saviour of the World) which is a part of the UNESCO World Heritage Site "Rock-Hewn Churches of Lalibela" and widely believed as the largest monolithic church in the world is home to the Lalibela Cross. This cross was looted in 1997 but returned back to Ethiopia in 2001.
